commitmsg:
Fix updating programs.

Same problem as deleting programs, we need to remove the extra data that
we added before trying to update the row.
Add tests for creating and deleting programs

Fix deletion of programs.

We can't use the row directly because we add some extra data to it. So
when we try to delete the row using that as a query, things go
haywire. Since slug and ID are both unique, we delete just based on
those columns.

Remove potential vulnerability.

I added multiple statement capability based on the NODE_ENV=test flag,
but even behind the flag I felt a little nervous about it. It wasn't too
much more work to make the harness handle loading the DB without
requiring multiple statement support, so I implemented it there.
First pass at API endpoints doc
Add test data, routes and schema update.
Add URL and email to program model.

Merge pull request #10 from mozilla/image-model

Generating proper image URLs

Merge pull request #9 from mozilla/badges-api

Badges API
Fixing badge instances that don't have images
Not failing where no image present
Adding link to image in badge data result

Merge pull request #8 from mozilla/6-issuer-api

Issuer API & model
Rearrange code, fix route names to use all plural.
Use a reduce instead of forEach
Can create, read, update and delete issuers.

Merge pull request #4 from andrewhayward/master

Initial commit
Consistent table naming for issuer model
Flip default for relationships in findSystem middleware
Use middleware in all system routes.

Fix badge routes test

* Test for conflicts on POST
* Update active badges list.
Show parent data in relationship'd badges.
Get all badges for issuers, including sub programs
Get all badges for specific programs.
Allow system, issuer, or program ID on badges.
Slightly better testing; image post flexibility.

Merge pull request #16 from mozilla/docs

First pass of API documentation
Update badge docs with changes from #21
Adding content-types and alternative request types

Merge pull request #21 from mozilla/14-systems

Systems model & API.

[closes #14]
Return ID when getting badge data.
Add systemId and programId to badge schema.

Implement system model.

It's exactly the same as the issuer & program models.

Add program model test.

It's exactly the same as the issuer model test.

Standardize issuer, program models.

Issuers, programs and systems are exactly the structures in the
database, as far as I can tell. This commit standardizes the code that
represents those models.

Merge pull request #18 from mozilla/17-refactor-and-test

Refactor & Test
Return full issuer object on PUT, POST.
Hollaback if there's an error putting.
Return formatted programs from PUT, POST.
Return formatted badge object from PUT, POST.

Factor our more helpers.

* db error handling
* validation error handling
* 404 handling
* getting images from POSTs.

Use .call with context in models to avoid `require`

We `require('validator')` in the `makeValidator` helper, then call the
individual validation functions with that object as the context so the
functions can call `check` with `this.check` instead of having to
require that validator library in every model.
Send back row on PUT, POST, DELETE for badges
Respond with row data on PUT, POST, DELETE.
Use `makeValidator` helper in the image model.

Remove `name` from errors.

Reduces a lot of redundancy.

Don't allow updating with garbage fields.

Use `safeExtend` to ensure the fields that are submitted actually exist
in the badge so we don't get a database error when we try to update.
Better validation error for PUT as well.

Add safe extend function.

`safeExtend` takes a target and a source and only copies fields from the
source that exist in the target.
Add statusCodes to test harness response; fix 404
Catch failures in badges API testing.
Test the rest of issuers API

Merge pull request #15 from mozilla/11-program-api

Programs API
Remove unnecessary event emitter from test-webhook-server.js
Can use claim codes when awarding badges.
Can make a new random claim code.
Take into account multiuse claim codes.

Merge pull request #34 from mozilla/12-badge-issuing

Implement badge issuing [closes #12]
Add `req.resolvePath`, use to create fully-qualified paths.
Add TODO about fully qualifying assertion URLs.
Factor our route suffix for creating new instances
Make `hash` lib, put `sha256` and `sha1` in there.

Merge pull request #44 from mozilla/niggles

Minor fixes
'All Programs' not being filtered by issuer
Making validation a little more consistent
Call system webhook when a badge is awarded.
Can create a valid badge assertion.
Can create badge instances and get the assertions.

Move webhooks into own schema/model, add webhook secret.

We want to be able to sign our webhook requests so the other end can
verify the request is coming from a trusted source. Our plan is to
generate a unique shared secret for each registered webhook. This secret
will be used *only* for signing outgoing webhook requests.

Two fixes to get things working

Merge pull request #25 from mozilla/24-relationships

Implement relationships [closes #24]

Don't take IDs in from POST on badge routes.

We used to require systemId, issuerId or programId on POST when the
badge routes were just `/badges/*` but since we have changed to
including the full parentage of the badge in the route, we can pull this
information without having to rely on user input.
